attributes.action: build council run gyms in every town with over 500 people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People in the UK are becoming more and more unfit. A solution would be to build gyms run by the local council which for example could be run at half the price of private gyms. This would allow people of lower incomes to use gyms and keep fit, therefore saving the NHS and the taxpayer millions on treating unfit people in the future.
